sarc.name: Name
sarc.login-failed-msg: Login failed, please check your name and password
sarc.bio-msg: Please provide the biological information for accurate assesment.
sarc.bind-msg: This card is Associated to you, please proceed tests.
sarc.card-msg: User crad reader to get card no
sarc.save-msg: Your information and measurments will be saved locally, but not to cloud. You can request the administrator to delete your local information and measurment.
sarc.save-failed-msg: Failed to save data. Please try again, or contact teh administrator.
sarc.guide-1-msg: Please take the registered card to the test stations, when all tests are done, come back to check the Measurements.
sarc.guide-2-2-msg: Input your name, click the matched user name.
sarc.guide-2-3-msg: In the Card No. field, use the card reader to read the new card. Click Save Data button.
sarc.guide-2-4-msg: Please take the new registered card to the test stations, when all tests are done, come back to check the Measurements.
sarc.management-note1: Names should be all lower case letters, without space, nor special characters.
sarc.management-note2: Password will be changed along with the name changed.
sarc.management-note3: Changes will take effect after clicking the Save Data button.
sarc.management-note4: Please logout then login again after any change.
sarc.admin-login-msg: Admin has great power, will logout after 1 hour automatically. If not for management purpose, please login with employee acount.
sarc.confirm-to-save-msg: Are you sure to save the changes?
